title: soundcore by Anker, Sleep A10 Bluetooth Sleep Earbuds, Noise Blocking Earbuds for Sleep, Comfortable Fit, Bluetooth 5.2, App, for Unlimited Sleep Sounds, Sleep Monitor, Personal Alarm, Side Sleeper
descriptions:
Drift into deeper, quieter sleep with soundcore by Anker Sleep A10 Bluetooth Sleep Earbuds—the ultra-slim, ultra-comfortable buds made for side sleepers and anyone who wants a peaceful night.

Why you’ll love them:
- All-night comfort: Featherlight, low-profile design sits snugly with no protruding parts, so you can sleep on your side without pressure or pain.
- Noise made manageable: The 4-Point Noise Masking System combines secure ear wings, Twin Seal ear tips, and smart volume control to cover common nighttime disruptions—without active noise cancelling, so you stay aware enough for safety.
- Sleep sounds on demand: Connect via Bluetooth 5.2 and open the soundcore app for unlimited white noise and soothing soundscapes. Customized dynamic drivers are tuned for sleep, delivering low-frequency audio optimized to mask noise and relax your mind.
- Smart sleep tech: Built-in sleep monitoring tracks your sleep status and provides insights on duration and quality. Your audio automatically pauses once you’ve drifted off to conserve battery and keep the night quiet.
- Wake gently, not the room: Set a personal alarm that wakes you privately—perfect for partners, roommates, and early starts.
- Indoor performance: Designed specifically for indoor use to ensure stable fit, effective noise masking, and consistent comfort all night long.

Make bedtime your best time with Sleep A10: the discreet, soothing, and smart way to block out the world and wake up refreshed.
